version.author: MPL
version.changelog: + support for setting ID before init, use reaper.SetExtState( 'mpl SendFader', 'currentID', ID_val, false ) + support for setting source TrackGUID before init, use reaper.SetExtState( 'mpl SendFader', 'srcTrack_GUID', ID_val, false )
